description.text: Generates a line of best fit for a set of data.

table.name: X Interpolated
table.descr: The array of X coordinates output. This will be of size 2 to indicate the endpoints of the line.

table.name: Y Interpolated
table.descr: The array of Y coordinates output. This will be of size 2 to indicate the endpoints of the line.

float.name: a
float.descr: The a value in the interpolation equation y = a + b*x.

float.name: b
float.descr: The b value in the interpolation equation y = a + b*x.

float.name: chi^2
float.descr: The chi-square result of the interpolation.
